participant_1.background:
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
I would like to spend more time with my family, but I have been very busy with my show.
I wonder if my co worker likes me back.
I have a love of nature from my early childhood.

participant_2.background:
I sing in the shower to clear my head before I face my parents.
i like to visit places around the world.
I once got to see System of a Down live in concert, and it was one of the best experiences of my life.
i have 2 cats and a dog.
I'm not afraid to break the rules and do things my own way.

content.text: Hi there, what's your favorite way to spend a day off?
I love to travel and go see new places! I've been all over the world and it's always so much fun to experience different cultures.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could travel more, but I'm so busy with my show. I'm a singer and I perform all over the place.
That's awesome! I love to sing too, but I'm not very good at it. I usually just sing in the shower to clear my head.
That's a great way to relax! I love taking long baths too. They're so therapeutic.
I love taking baths too! I usually bring my cats in with me and we all relax together.
That sounds so cute! I love cats. I have two of them myself.
Cats are the best! They're so cuddly and loving.
I know, right? They're the best companions.
I'm so glad we met! I love talking to people who love cats as much as I do.
Me too! It's so rare to find someone who gets it
